free_text.Learning outcomes: Provide a more in depth knowledge about infection biology and[br/]host-pathogen interactions (bacterial, viral, eukaryotic). Mode of action of antimicrobials.
free_text.Content: [li] Evolution of pathogens and horizontal gene transfer [br/][li] Bacterial infections (intra vs. extracellular bacteria)[br/][li] Acute vs. chronic infections[br/][li] Diarrheal diseases[br/][li] Respiratory diseases[br/][li] Pathogenic fungi[br/][li] Biofilms[br/][li] Viral infections[br/][li] Viruses and cancer[br/][li] Antimicrobials[br/][li] Eukaryotic pathogens (Plasmodium, Trypanosome, Worms)[br/][li] Bacterial communities and gut microbiota[br/][li] Epidemiology[br/][li] Identification of virulence factors
